title: 10/14: Injury Updates and Struggling Offenses (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Dr. David Chao joins us to discuss Amari Cooper, Patrick Mahomes, Saquon Barkley and more players with injury concerns. Then Will Brinson and Chris Towers debate some struggling offenses! What's going on with the Rams (14:00)? Buy or Sell Austin Ekeler (21:00)? What's up with Keenan Allen (26:35)? Is Miles Sanders poised for more carries (31:45)? And was Will right about the Chiefs offense (35:00)? Let the debates begin!
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: How concerned are you about the Rams and Chiefs offenses? What about the Chargers offense while we're at it? We discuss these topics after Dr. David Chao joins us for an injury report.
